summary: Provides an inâ€‘memory mock implementation of the AWS Managed Blockchain service, defining data models for networks, members, nodes, proposals and invitations and a backend that supports creation, retrieval, update, deletion and enumeration of these resources as well as governance actions such as voting on proposals.
business_intent: Allows developers to test and develop applications that integrate with AWS Managed Blockchain without contacting the real service, by offering a fully functional simulated API for unit and integration testing.
